humanum_full_description_en:
From " mountain ", " strict " sound, the original meaning is cliff bank, that is, the edge of mountain or high ground. "Shuowen": "The shore. From the mountain, the sound is strict." "Shan Hai Jing-Hai Nei Xi Jing": "In the rock of the eight corners and the Chishui, it is not the rock of Renyi that can go up to the hill."

" Rock " can mean a mountain. "Songs of the Chu-Heaven Questions": "If you prevent the poor from marching westward, the rock is more and more difficult."

" Rock " can also mean a cave. "Zhuangzi‧ Zaiyou": "So the sages are lying under the mountain and rock." Wang Xianqian's collection: "Chan, be regarded as'Zhan'...Zhan, deep. The mountain speaks loudly, and the rock speaks deeply."

" Rock " can mean rock. "Historical Records: The Benji of Gaozu": "The Gaozu is suspicious, and hides himself among the rocks of Mang and Dangshan."

" Rock " can also mean high and steep. "Guangya·Shigusi": "Rock, Gaoya." "Mencius: Heart-to-heart": "He who knows his fate does not stand under a rock wall."

" Rock " also means Gaolang. Song Li Jie "Building French Eaves": "Step eaves are called corridors, and steep corridors are called rocks."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " mountain ", " yan ", the original meaning is cliff bank, that is, the edge of mountain or highland.
humanum_full_description:
從「山」，「嚴」聲，本義為崖岸，即山或高地的邊。《說文》：「岸也。从山，嚴聲。」《山海經‧海內西經》：「在八隅之巖，赤水之際，非仁羿莫能上岡之巖。」

　　「巖」可表示山峰。《楚辭‧天問》：「阻窮西征，巖何越焉。」

　　「巖」也可表示洞穴。《莊子‧在宥》：「故賢者伏處大山嵁巖之下。」王先謙集解：「嵁，當為‘湛’……湛，深也。山以大言，巖以深言。」

　　「巖」可表示岩石。《史記‧高祖本紀》：「高祖即自疑，亡匿，隱於芒、碭山澤巖石之間。」

　　「巖」還可表示高峻。《廣雅‧釋詁四》：「巖，高也。」《孟子‧盡心上》：「是故知命者，不立乎巖牆之下。」

　　「巖」亦表示高廊。宋李誡《營造法式‧檐》：「步檐謂之廊，峻廊謂之巖。」
humanum_short_description: 從「山」，「嚴」聲，本義為崖岸，即山或高地的邊。

巖層 [ yán céng ]: variant of 岩層 |岩层 ; rock strata
Pictophonetic: 嚴 indicates the sound; 山 (mountain) conveys the meaning.
Hanzi: 巌

從「 山 」，「 嚴 」聲，本義為崖岸，即山或高地的邊。《說文》：「岸也。从山，嚴聲。」《山海經‧海內西經》：「在八隅之巖，赤水之際，非仁羿莫能上岡之巖。」 「 巖 」可表示山峰。《楚辭‧天問》：「阻窮西征，巖何越焉。」 「 巖 」也可表示洞穴。《莊子‧在宥》：「故賢者伏處大山嵁巖之下。」王先謙集解：「嵁，當為‘湛’……湛，深也。山以大言，巖以深言。」 「 巖 」可表示岩石。《史記‧高祖本紀》：「高祖即自疑，亡匿，隱於芒、碭山澤巖石之間。」 「 巖 」還可表示高峻。《廣雅‧釋詁四》：「巖，高也。」《孟子‧盡心上》：「是故知命者，不立乎巖牆之下。」 「 巖 」亦表示高廊。宋李誡《營造法式‧檐》：「步檐謂之廊，峻廊謂之巖。」
From " mountain", " strict" sound, the original meaning is cliff bank, that is, the edge of mountain or high ground. "Shuowen": "The shore. From the mountain, the sound is strict." "Shan Hai Jing-Hai Nei Xi Jing": "In the rock of the eight corners and the Chishui, it is not the rock of Renyi that can go up to the hill." " Rock" can mean a mountain. "Songs of the Chu-Heaven Questions": "If you prevent the poor from marching westward, the rock is more and more difficult." " Rock" can also mean a cave. "Zhuangzi‧ Zaiyou": "So the sages are lying under the mountain and rock." Wang Xianqian's collection: "Chan, be regarded as'Zhan'...Zhan, deep. The mountain speaks loudly, and the rock speaks deeply." " Rock" can mean rock. "Historical Records: The Benji of Gaozu": "The Gaozu is suspicious, and hides himself among the rocks of Mang and Dangshan." " Rock" can also mean high and steep. "Guangya·Shigusi": "Rock, Gaoya." "Mencius: Heart-to-heart": "He who knows his fate does not stand under a rock wall." " Rock" also means Gaolang. Song Li Jie "Building French Eaves": "Step eaves are called corridors, and steep corridors are called rocks."

巖字的基本解释

巖
yán
同“岩”。

巖字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yán］
［《廣韻》五銜切，平銜，疑。］
亦作“壧1”。亦作“嵒1”。亦作“嵓1”。亦作“巗1”。亦作“岩1”。“險3”的被通假字。
(1)崖岸，山或高地的边。
(2)山峰。
(3)石窟；洞穴。
(4)险要。参见“巖邑”。
(5)高。
(6)高廊。
(7)岩石。构成地壳的石头。详“巖石”。
(8)古地名傅巖的略称。详“巖野”。

巖字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　巖； 康熙笔画：23； 页码：页323第07
【唐韻】五銜切【集韻】魚銜切【韻會】疑銜切【正韻】魚咸切，?音嵒。【說文】岸也。从山嚴聲。【增韻】石窟曰巖，深通曰洞。　一曰險也。【左傳·隱元年】制巖邑也。【公羊傳·僖三十三年】殽之嶔巖，文王所避風雨也。　又嶃巖，高峻貌。【司馬相如·上林賦】嶄巖嵾嵳。　又巖廊，殿廡也。【漢武帝·策賢良制】虞舜之時，遊於巖廊之上。　又地名。【書·說命】說築傅巖之野。【傳】傅巖，在虞虢之閒。　又【集韻】魚杴切【韻會】疑杴切，?音嚴。巖巖，高貌。【詩·魯頌】泰山巖巖，魯邦所詹。　又【正字通】本作嚴。亦作巖。通作礹嵒碞。○按巖與嵒同。《說文》嵒，五咸切，山巖也。巖，五緘切，岸也。同字分訓巖，專訓岸，?非。嚴巖礹?从?作。

考證：〔【公羊傳·僖三十二年】殽之嶔巖，文王所避風雨處。〕　謹照原文三十二年改三十三年。處改也。

暂无。
